title: Stuck at syncing with Ropsten
body:
Hi there,
#### System information

Geth version: `v1.7.1-stable`
OS & Version: `Windows`

#### Expected behaviour
I wanted to sync with testnet with commands like **geth --testnet --syncmode=full**

#### Actual behaviour
I have stuck at this line INFO [02-23|18:36:23] IPC endpoint opened: \\.\pipe\geth.ipc

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I have tried to change command and delete folders but it still does not work
When i use **geth --syncmode=full** it is working and downloading blocks

#### Backtrace

````
C:\Users\PC\Desktop\BlockChain\geth>geth --testnet --syncmode=full
WARN [02-23|18:36:21] No etherbase set and no accounts found as default
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Starting peer-to-peer node               instance=Geth/v1.7.1-stable-05101641/windows-amd64/go1.9
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Allocated cache and file handles         database=C:\\Users\\PC\\AppData\\Roaming\\Ethereum\\testnet\\geth\\chaindata cache=128 handles=1024
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Writing custom genesis block
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Initialised chain configuration          config="{ChainID: 3 Homestead: 0 DAO: <nil> DAOSupport: true EIP150: 0 EIP155: 10 EIP158: 10 Byzantium: 1700000 Engine: ethash}"

INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Disk storage enabled for ethash caches   dir=C:\\Users\\PC\\AppData\\Roaming\\Ethereum\\testnet\\geth\\ethash count=3
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Disk storage enabled for ethash DAGs     dir=C:\\Users\\PC\\AppData\\Ethash                                   count=2
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[63 62]" network=3
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Loaded most recent local header          number=0 hash=419410…ca4a2d td=1048576
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Loaded most recent local full block      number=0 hash=419410…ca4a2d td=1048576
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Loaded most recent local fast block      number=0 hash=419410…ca4a2d td=1048576
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Regenerated local transaction journal    transactions=0 accounts=0
INFO [02-23|18:36:21] Starting P2P networking
INFO [02-23|18:36:23] UDP listener up                          self=enode://5c6b2b0fb83020b83a39821838a89a141920d0027a3a11898e2e1e637626562808b8dd27ff571820b1a5005b02ceb2c8434d5c0191d801b78f9
493b14ed04c7b@0.0.0.0:30303
INFO [02-23|18:36:23] RLPx listener up                         self=enode://5c6b2b0fb83020b83a39821838a89a141920d0027a3a11898e2e1e637626562808b8dd27ff571820b1a5005b02ceb2c8434d5c0191d801b78f9
493b14ed04c7b@0.0.0.0:30303
INFO [02-23|18:36:23] IPC endpoint opened: \\.\pipe\geth.ipc
````
Please update to 1.8.1. The Ropsten bootnodes have been changed as far as I know.
